attributes.action: Reduce Duty on all fuels used for Transportation and Heating by 60 %
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The basic requirements for life (Heating, Transportation of goods and freedom of movement)of the British population are all affected by unacceptably high levels of duty. More so in the present economic climate. We the undersigned therefore request the considerate reduction in duty in able to restore a sustainable life economic balance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
